description:
HEXplore, HEXploit, HEXterminate!

The land of Ohurat is loaded with misteries and precious resources, but also filled with great dangers. Take control of one of its most powerfull factions and get ready to anihilate everyone in your path!

Controls:

wasd - move the camera;

q and e - rotate the camera;

left mouse button - select unit/city;

right mouse button - move or attack with unit;

spacebar - next turn;

you city starts with 30 resources and produce 5 more each turn. Units cost 10 resources each. Good luck

In the first build: 

The Visokean Republic - “While a brilliant commander or a powerful piece of equipment can win a battle, only a devout and willing people can win a war.” - Republican marshall Raveck.

Eons ago, Visokea was the capital of a vast empire. Years of bad management and a corrupt monarchy reduced its explendor to nothing but one single remnant city. Hearing the people clamor, insurgent militaries have overtaken control over the city. One last attempt of returning Visokea to its former glory!

Using its powerfull Zeppelin Squadrons dominate the skies of Ohurat and destroy each and everything in your path to rise above as the most formidable nation!

As of the first release alpha 0.1.x, we are issuing a challenge: a speedrun! there are 6 enemies hidden around the mapa, how fast can you kill them all??
